As you stand on the dockside waiting to board the cruise ship you are thinking and looking forward to your holiday on board.
You are with:


Option 5 only:

You are already on the cruise ship prepearing for the passengers to board making sure everything is as it should be with your fellow crew members.

You are either male or female

info.brief_description: During a cruise which you're on your own or with others you and/or others shrink. Survive!
info.description:
You have got several choices of who you are going to be.

Option 1:
You are Shaun Collins (19)
http://img525.imageshack.us/my.php?image=shaun19.jpg
and have just proposed to your girlfriend Lyndsey (21)
http://img407.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lyndsey21.jpg
whom you have been going out with for 3 years. You attend the same University and she caught your eye during a night in the college bar. You got chatting with her and she said you were a real charm. She invited you back to her room and it progressed from there. Having just proposed to her, you decide to take her on a round the world cruise and book some tickets for a 3 week trip. She is thrilled when you finally tell her. On the cruise ship though, a week into the cruise, during a night in the bar, someone spikes your drinks and you and your fiancée shrink. Now you must survive on board.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Option 2:
You are on a cruise with your girlfriend, as you both want a holiday. Deciding on a cruise there is no-one you would rather go with than your girlfriend.
You (Simon Wallis, 18) and your girlfriend (Sarah Jacobs, 18)
http://img407.imageshack.us/my.php?image=simonsarah.png
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Option 3:
You are on a cruise with your family (Phillips) and next door neighbours (Woodcock's)
You can choose a character from either family. If you choose one from the Phillips, then you are Ewan, if you choose the Woodcock's, then you are Callum.

Phillips family:
Your character is Ewan Phillips, a 17 year old Engineering student at college. You have a girlfriend called Sadie.

Kristin Phillips 43 yrs old
http://img14.imageshack.us/my.php?image=kristin.jpg
Colin Phillips 45 yrs old
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=colin.jpg
Stephanie Phillips 18 yrs old
http://img14.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stephanie18.jpg
Ewan Phillips 17 yrs old & Sadie Williamson 16 yrs old (Ewan's girlfriend)http://img205.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ewan17sandie16.jpg
Jodie Phillips 16 yrs old
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=jodie16.jpg


Woodcock Family
Your character is Callum Woodcock, an 11 year old kid who is quite mischevious and loves adventuring, being the youngest he is the brunt of quite a few practical jokes from his brother Adam and sisters Annaliese, Natalie & Christina.


Tim Woodcock 50 yrs old
http://img205.imageshack.us/my.php?image=tim.jpg
Jane Woodcock 48 yrs old
http://img205.imageshack.us/my.php?image=jane.jpg
Adam Woodcock 20 yrs old
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=adam20.jpg
Annaliese Woodcock 18 yrs old
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=annaliese18.jpg
Natalie Woodcock 16 yrs old
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=natalie16.jpg
Christina Woodcock 14 yrs old
http://img205.imageshack.us/my.php?image=christina11.jpg
Callum Woodcock 13 yrs old
http://img14.imageshack.us/my.php?image=callum10.jpg
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Option 4:
You (Marc or Jennifer) are on a cruise with University mates 6 girls/5 boys after graduating from your degrees.
After a night in the nightclub, you go to bed and wake up shrunk. Now you must survive and get help from your friends.

Abi Richards, 23
http://img11.imageshack.us/my.php?image=abi.png
Gemma Dowers, 21

Option 5:

You (Jaime Harris, 21 or Gemma, 23) work on a cruise ship and somehow shrink, now you must get someone's attention.

Jaime works in the cruise ships casino.
Gemma works in the cruise ships 5 star restaurant and has regularly served meals to the likes of Kirsten Dunst, The Spice Girls, Kylie Minogue, Emma Watson and many others.

Jaime Harris, 21
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=jaime.jpg
Gemma Bailey, 23
http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=gemma.jpg
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I look forward to seeing your chapters and would appreciate your ratings on this story.

Yours
HannahX
